namespace Threadlink.Core.NativeSubsystems.Iris
{
    public static partial class Iris
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// AUTO-GENERATED BY THREADLINK'S CODEGEN. DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY.
        /// <para></para>
        /// ID Markers of the events observed and published by <see cref="Iris"/>.
        /// The signatures of the native events must be respected across the codebase.
        /// Similarly, the User is responsible for the correctness and consistency of all user-defined event signatures.
        /// </summary>
        public enum Events : ushort
        {
            OnNativeSubsystemRegistration,
            OnUserSubsystemRegistration,
            OnCoreDeployed,
            OnUpdate,
            OnFixedUpdate,
            OnLateUpdate,
            OnPlaytimeCountTick,
            OnGamePaused,
            OnGameResumed,
            OnInputDeviceChanged,
            OnUICancelled,
            OnUIElementSelected,
            OnInteract,
            OnInteractableDetected,
            OnInteractableOutOfRange,
            OnPlayerLoadStateCheck,
            OnActiveSceneRequested,
            OnBeforeActiveSceneUnload,
            OnActiveSceneFinishedUnloading,
            OnNewSceneFinishedLoading,
            OnDisplayFaderAsync,
            OnHideFaderAsync,
            OnDisplayLoadingScreenAsync,
            OnHideLoadingScreenAsync,
            OnUnloadPlayer,
            OnLoadPlayerAsync,
            OnPlacePlayer,
            OnLoadingProcessFinished,
            {User-Defined Event IDs}
        }
    }
}
